articles.author: Maegan Vazquez and Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Biden says verdict in Chauvin trial could be a step toward racial justice in America and urges country to come together - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden welcomed Tuesday's guilty verdict in the murder trial of a former Minneapolis police officer but said the outcome was "too rare" for the country to turn away now from issues of systemic racism.

articles.title: US Ex-Cop Derek Chauvin Convicted Of George Floyd's Murder - NDTV
articles.description: Derek Chauvin, a white former Minneapolis police officer, was convicted Tuesday of murdering African-American George Floyd after a racially charged trial that was seen as a pivotal test of police accountability in the United States.
articles.content:
Derek Chauvin faces a maximum of 40 years in prison
